mapper.select: SELECT user_id, passport_no, country, gender, first_name, last_name, name, kr_first_name, kr_last_name, birth, email, phone_number, passport_expiry_date, passport_issue_country FROM user_profile WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE user_profile up JOIN users u ON u.user_id = up.user_id SET up.passport_no = NULL, up.country = NULL, up.gender = NULL, up.first_name = NULL, up.last_name = NULL, up.name = #{maskedName}, up.kr_first_name = NULL, up.kr_last_name = NULL, up.birth = NULL, up.email = NULL, up.phone_number = '', up.passport_expiry_date = NULL, up.passport_issue_country = NULL WHERE up.user_id = #{userId} AND u.status = 'WITHDRAWN'
